newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: PHILIPPINE STOCKS - factors to watch - Jan 3.
newsitem.headline: PHILIPPINE STOCKS - factors to watch - Jan 3.

text.p: Following are some of the main factors likely to affect Philippine stocks on Friday:
* On Thursday, the Dow Jones slipped 5.78 points to 6,442.49. PLDT's ADR rose $0 3/8 to 51 3/8.
* On Thursday, the peso strengthened to 26.286 to a U.S. dollar from 26.299.
* The Philippine Stock Exchange index closed at 3,154.48, down 16.08.
* The Philippine interbank call loan average rate rose to 12.8125 pct from 11.15625 pct.
